content:
I think I'll start by asking questions related to my art and reading series, such as "What inspires your creativity?" or "What's your favorite book genre and why?" I'll also ask for feedback on my content, like "What do you think of this new painting style?" or "Would you like to see more book reviews or author interviews?"

I'll try to ask questions at the end of each post, and also use Instagram Stories to ask more casual, conversational questions. I might also create a monthly "Q&A" post where I answer questions from my followers, and share some behind-the-scenes content or tips related to my art and reading habits.

I'll also make sure to respond to comments and messages promptly, and engage with my followers by liking and commenting on their posts as well. I want to create a sense of community and connection with my audience, and show them that I value their input and opinions.

Speaking of community, I've been thinking about collaborating with other artists
